course_title: Structures of Endangered Languages: Conservation and Revitalization

sections.comments: This is a waitlist section for undergraduate students - only register in this section if FNEL 282 001 is full. Registering in the waitlist section does not guarantee you a spot in the course. When spots open up you will be moved from this section to the actual course. Email cis.program@ubc.ca with any questions.

description: Development of skills in the documentation, transcription and analysis of grammatical structures in endangered languages, focusing on the diversity within BC Aboriginal languages. Applied techniques in documentation, workflow and multi-media digital annotation, guided by community-based ethical protocols and conservation/revitalization goals.
